items.summary: Update the static coloring book PDF served at the exact URL `/assets/coloring-book.pdf` to include the two user-uploaded images as additional coloring pages: `colorifyai-1770544927646.png` and `colorifyai-1770544979559.png`. The updated PDF must preserve clean black-and-white line art (no unexpected color fills) and print cleanly on letter/A4 pages.

Add the two uploaded source images to the frontend static assets (so the project retains the originals used to build the PDF) without changing their filenames: `colorifyai-1770544927646.png` and `colorifyai-1770544979559.png`.
